name: Konstructive
description:
Konstructive is a digital design, user-experience and technology company focused on building great online presences. We work closely in partnership with clients in retail and professional services (law, accounting, property marketing) to deliver great online propositions that create competitive advantage and opportunity.
Konstructive have over 25 years of experience in delivering successful digital projects. We are specialists in Wordpress, Magnolia, Magento and Commerce Kit.
